history.title: About Deerfoot Inn & Casino
history.description2: Deerfoot Inn & Casino is a modern entertainment destination combining a comfortable hotel with exciting gaming. Guests can enjoy a wide range of slot machines and table games, as well as participate in thrilling tournaments. The casino offers an atmosphere of excitement and the chance for big wins. Beyond gaming, visitors can experience restaurants, bars, and live shows. It’s the perfect spot for relaxation, entertainment, and unforgettable experiences.

customHtml.title: A World of Excitement and Comfort
customHtml.description:
Deerfoot Inn & Casino is a unique destination where thrilling gaming meets comfort and top-notch service. The casino offers an electrifying atmosphere, a wide selection of slot machines and table games, and the chance to test your luck in poker tournaments. Whether you’re seeking excitement or relaxation, this venue has something for everyone.


The complex features stylish bars and restaurants serving exquisite dishes and signature cocktails. Wild Horse Pub delights guests with live music and a laid-back vibe, while Chrome Showroom hosts vibrant concerts and entertainment shows. A variety of drinks and snacks are available to make every visit enjoyable.


The Deerfoot Inn hotel provides spacious rooms with modern amenities, including free Wi-Fi, a fitness center, and an indoor pool with a waterslide. It’s the perfect place for those who want to combine leisure with entertainment without leaving the property. Family rooms and suites ensure comfort for all types of travelers.


Special attention is given to events and entertainment. The casino regularly organizes themed nights, concerts, and sports screenings, creating a festive atmosphere every day. Guests can enjoy live music, join karaoke sessions, or unwind in the spa area.


For bonus lovers, a loyalty program offers exclusive perks, special promotions, and extra chances to win. New players receive welcome bonuses, while regular guests gain access to private events and personalized offers. This makes gaming even more exciting and rewarding.


Rules for Visiting Deerfoot Inn & Casino

Visiting Deerfoot Inn & Casino requires following certain guidelines to ensure comfort and safety for all guests. The main requirements include age restrictions, dress code, and proper conduct within the venue. The management aims to create an atmosphere where everyone feels secure and respected.


Key Rules

  • • Minimum age for entry is 18 years (valid ID required).
  • • Dress code is “smart casual”: beachwear, athletic outfits, and overly revealing clothing are not allowed.
  • • Bringing outside food or drinks and engaging in disruptive behavior is prohibited.
  • • Photography in gaming areas is restricted to protect guest privacy.
  • • All winnings and bonuses are issued only upon presenting valid identification.

Deerfoot Inn & Casino Loyalty Program — Rewards That Pay Off

The loyalty program at Deerfoot Inn & Casino is called Club 1 Rewards, designed to make gaming more rewarding and exciting. Members earn points for playing slots, video poker, and table games, which can be redeemed for free play, gifts, or exclusive offers. Signing up is easy and free—just register and use your card every time you play.


The biggest advantage is the ability to accumulate points and unlock exclusive bonuses, including boosted multipliers during special promotions. For example, players can enjoy 10X bonus points during designated promotional periods, helping them reach top rewards faster.


Program Benefits

  • • Free registration and instant access to rewards
  • • Points earned for every dollar spent on games
  • • Redeem points for free play and gifts
  • • Special promotions: up to 10X bonus points during events
  • • Exclusive offers for loyal players

Conditions and Tiers

  • • Minimum age requirement: 18 years
  • • Club 1 Rewards card required for point accumulation
  • • One main tier with enhanced bonuses during promotions
  • • Points valid for 60 days after earning

Bonuses

  • • Welcome bonuses for new members
  • • Increased multipliers on slots and video poker
  • • Special prize draws and access to private events

customHtml_2.title: Entertainment and Gaming at  Deerfoot Inn & Casino
customHtml_2.description:
Bonuses and Special Offers at Deerfoot Inn & Casino

Deerfoot Inn & Casino offers guests more than just gaming—it’s a hub of bonuses, special deals, and seasonal events. Every visit can be unique thanks to promotions tied to games, entertainment, and holiday celebrations. The casino frequently hosts prize draws, themed nights, and live concerts, while also providing extra chances to win big. Special offers extend beyond gaming to include dining, bars, and shows, creating a festive atmosphere all year round.


Bonuses and Offers

  • • Welcome bonus for new players: up to 1,000 CAD on initial bets.
  • • Slot jackpots: winnings up to 500,000 CAD in progressive games.
  • • Daily promotions: free spins and extra credits for regular guests.
  • • Seasonal events: themed parties for Halloween, Christmas, and New Year with prize giveaways.
  • • Concerts and shows: discounted tickets for Chrome Showroom events for players.
  • • Bar specials: Happy Hour and cocktail discounts during promotions.
  • • Car and big prize draws: periodic lotteries for active players.

Popular Games at Deerfoot Inn & Casino

Deerfoot Inn & Casino offers a wide range of exciting games for both beginners and seasoned players. The casino features over 785 modern slot machines, including progressive jackpots, and a dedicated high-limit gaming area. Fans of table games can enjoy classics like blackjack, roulette, and baccarat, along with unique variations that add extra excitement. Poker enthusiasts will love the spacious poker room, which hosts regular tournaments, including prestigious series. The venue combines thrilling gameplay with comfort, making every visit unforgettable.


Popular Games

  • • Slots: over 785 machines, including progressive jackpots with winnings up to 500,000 CAD.
  • • Table Games: blackjack, Free Bet Blackjack, Double Down Madness, roulette, Ultimate Texas Hold’em, EZ Baccarat, Ruyi Baccarat, and craps.
  • • Poker: dedicated poker room with tournaments, including the World Series of Poker Circuit featuring big prize pools.
  • • High-Limit Gaming: exclusive VIP area for high-stakes players.
  • • Video Poker: classic and modern versions for card game fans.

Minimum and Maximum Bets at Deerfoot Inn & Casino

Deerfoot Inn & Casino offers flexible betting options to suit every player’s budget. You can start with low stakes on slots and gradually move to higher limits in the VIP High Limit Room. Table games feature accessible minimum bets, while poker and high-limit areas cater to those seeking big wins. This variety makes the casino ideal for both beginners and seasoned players.


Game Type Minimum Bet Maximum Bet
Slots 0.01 CAD 5 CAD
Video Lottery (VLT) 1 CAD varies by game
Table Games from 5 CAD up to 500 CAD+
Poker (Cash Games) blinds from 1/2 CAD No Limit Hold’em
High Limit Room from 50 CAD up to 1,000 CAD+

Events and Entertainment at Deerfoot Inn & Casino

Deerfoot Inn & Casino is more than just gaming—it’s a vibrant hub of entertainment and special events. Guests can enjoy concerts, themed parties, and live shows that create a festive atmosphere throughout the year. The Chrome Showroom serves as the main stage for performances by renowned artists, comedy acts, and exclusive events.


For nightlife enthusiasts, the Wild Horse Pub offers karaoke, live music, and dance parties, making it a favorite spot for evening fun. The casino also hosts seasonal celebrations like Halloween, Christmas, and New Year’s Eve, featuring prize giveaways and unique promotions. Sports fans can catch major games on big screens, while comedy lovers enjoy stand-up shows and themed entertainment nights.


Regular entertainment includes concerts, karaoke nights, DJ parties, and special dining experiences in bars and restaurants. It’s the perfect destination for those looking to combine gaming with a dynamic cultural and nightlife experience.


All Entertainment and Events

  • • Chrome Showroom — concerts by top artists, comedy shows, themed parties.
  • • Wild Horse Pub — karaoke, live performances, dance nights, sports screenings.
  • • Seasonal Events — Halloween, Christmas, New Year celebrations with prize draws.
  • • DJ Nights — late-night dance parties with DJs.
  • • Comedy Shows — stand-up performances and comedy acts.
  • • Sports Screenings — major sporting events on large screens.

Bars, Restaurants, and Relaxation at Deerfoot Inn & Casino

Deerfoot Inn & Casino is more than just a gaming destination—it’s a complete leisure and dining experience. The venue features stylish bars and restaurants offering everything from gourmet dishes to light snacks. Guests can enjoy signature cocktails, premium steaks, fresh seafood, and international cuisine. The ambiance ranges from casual in the pub to elegant in the main restaurant, allowing visitors to choose the perfect setting for their mood.


The Deerfoot Inn hotel provides comfortable rooms with modern amenities, including free Wi-Fi, a fitness center, and an indoor pool with a waterslide. It’s the ideal spot for those looking to combine gaming with relaxation. Guests can also unwind in the spa area, soak in the jacuzzi, or enjoy live music at one of the bars.


Dining and Leisure Spots

  • • Wild Horse Pub — cozy pub with live music, karaoke, and sports screenings.
  • • Chrome Showroom Bar — bar in the concert area, perfect for parties and shows.
  • • Buffet & Grill — restaurant with diverse menus and themed dinners.
  • • Lobby Lounge — stylish space for cocktails and light bites.
  • • Deerfoot Inn Hotel — spacious rooms, pool, fitness center, spa facilities.

items.title: Do I need to register to play?
items.answer: Yes, registration is required for gaming and bonuses.

items.title: Can I pay by card?
items.answer: Yes, credit and debit cards are accepted, as well as cash.

items.title: What languages do staff speak?
items.answer: English is primary, French is often available.

items.title: How do I get a loyalty card?
items.answer: Club 1 Rewards card can be issued at the registration desk.

items.title: What are the casino hours?
items.answer: The casino is open 24/7; bars and restaurants follow schedules.
